internal.content: --- title: API Tokens description: Guides for managing API Tokens --- API Tokens allow you to access our{' '} public API without a using username or password. To create a new API Token: 1. Go to [profile settings](https://platform.projectpandora.xyz/profile) page and choose the **Tokens** tab. 2. Click **Create an API Token** button, input name and choose expires date for the new API Token. 3. Confirm by click **Add**. In the next section, you will be able to see your new token. Save this somewhere because you won't see it again. To delete an API Token: 1. Go to [profile settings](https://platform.projectpandora.xyz/profile) page and choose the **Tokens** tab. 2. Click the **Delete** button next to the token name. 3. Press **Delete** in the confirm modal.

MdxNode.rawBody: --- title: API Tokens description: Guides for managing API Tokens --- API Tokens allow you to access our{' '} public API without a using username or password. To create a new API Token: 1. Go to [profile settings](https://platform.projectpandora.xyz/profile) page and choose the **Tokens** tab. 2. Click **Create an API Token** button, input name and choose expires date for the new API Token. 3. Confirm by click **Add**. In the next section, you will be able to see your new token. Save this somewhere because you won't see it again. To delete an API Token: 1. Go to [profile settings](https://platform.projectpandora.xyz/profile) page and choose the **Tokens** tab. 2. Click the **Delete** button next to the token name. 3. Press **Delete** in the confirm modal.
